title: Visa and Mastercard unveil AI-powered shopping
summary: Artificial intelligence is not just infiltrating the startup world. Now, credit card giants Visa and Mastercard are getting into the AI game. Visa announced on Wednesday “Intelligent Commerce,” which it says enables AI “to find and buy.” AI agents will be able to shop and make purchases on behalf of consumers, based on preselected preferences. […]

filter_verdict.reasoning_summary: Significant development involving major players Visa and Mastercard adopting AI for commerce, but not urgent or high-impact enough to be 'Breaking'.

seo_agent_results.generated_article_body_md:
## Visa and Mastercard Roll Out AI-Powered Shopping Solutions  

Visa and Mastercard are stepping into the AI-powered shopping space with new innovations. Visa’s “Intelligent Commerce” platform allows AI agents to shop and buy products on behalf of users, guided by preselected preferences.  

The move signals a shift toward automation in consumer spending, with AI handling transactions seamlessly. Mastercard is expected to announce similar AI-driven shopping capabilities soon.
